text: Donald James Henderson (August 7, 1940 – May 2, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He was a Liberal member of the Legislative Assembly of Ontario from 1985 to 1995. He represented the ridings of Humber and Etobicoke—Humber. He was born in Sudbury, Ontario. Henderson died in Toronto on May 2, 2020 from problems caused by Parkinson's disease and COVID-19, aged 79.The Globe and Mail: Donald James HENDERSON ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Canada Category:People from Greater Sudbury Category:Politicians from Toronto
title: Jim Henderson (politician)
